timeline.bodyText:
Warning: Bikeshedding ahead
I realize that the event name is quite long already, but I'm missing the term location in there: My proposal: POLLER_PACKAGE_LOCATION_ASSOCIATION_CHANGED.
timeline.author: fooker

      */
